name: Interview at Incredible Inc.
description:
(Make sure you have flash enabled on your browser, or the game may not show up above!)

This game was made for Ludum Dare 34 and was made in 48 hours. The theme used was "two button controls".

You got an interview at the renowned Incredible Incorporated! Make a good impression in your interview and get a job at one of the coolest places on earth!

Since this game uses the "Two Button Controls" theme, the controls are rather simple! The "Y" key for yes, and the "N" key for no.

http://EvanEGibbs.com
